name: Beat Ninja (itch) (JHD)
description:
Prototype/concept rhythm game for Android.

Beat Ninja is an exciting fusion of Beat Saber and Fruit Ninja. Players slice blocks in time with the music and receive a score based on their performance. Points are earned from each game that can be used to purchase new songs and cosmetic customisations. See if you can beat my highscores!

Key Features:

  • Four different songs to enjoy
  • Addictive and cathartic gameplay
  • Visualizer
  • Progression and unlocks

Technical Features:

  • Integrated ads via google adsense
  • Dynamic support for different resolutions and aspect ratios
  • Automatic saving to persistent datapath

This app was created by me in 2020 in my third year of university. I do not profit from the ads or any part of this project. If anyone wants me to remove their music I'd be happy to do so.
